title: James Bond Nightfire PC RIP
description:
Great game. Works online. No CD Key required. No Installation required. Uses 7z compression. Can decompress with the latest WINRAR or use the 7zip open source software itself at http://www.7-zip.org/ It&#039;s free.

This download uses the patched 1.1 version of the game. To play online take the client.dll from the nightfire/backup folder and paste it into the nightfire/bond/cl_dll folder. It will overwrite the 1.1 version back to 1.0 and allow you to join servers online.

The movies and some of the sounds have been removed as they are unnecessary and just take up alot of space. The original version is 1.18 gig, this one has been squeezed down to under 500MB.

The game has a great old school style of gameplay. It&#039;s like quake 3 mixed with Goldeneye from the N64. Online play is great and i&#039;ve spent hours zoned out playing. 
Hope you enjoy.
